title: Greek National Water Company - Water Management System - Junction
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic curve made for raw-water supply management domain

tag.description: An optional text used to assign the curve to a category, perhaps one based on age or the served area

curveType.description: The curve type. Values restricted to 'DischargeCoefficient - RelativeOpening', 'ELEVATION - DISCHARGE', 'C/Co - H/Ho', 'P/ Ho', 'C – h/width of spillway'

xData.description: X data points for the curve

yData.description: Y data points for the curve
